radiographic_examinations.findings: Cystic lesions in the third to fifth metacarpal and in the carpal bones bilaterally, as well as below the left ulnar styloid process.
Synovitis of third MCPs and tenosynovitis of extensor tendons of both wrists.

radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: MRI of the hand and wrist
radiographic_examinations.findings: Confirmed findings of synovitis and tenosynovitis, and revealed multiple cystic lesions in styloid process of ulna, carpal bones, and the heads of third to fifth metacarpal bones.
